Northern Antibiotics.Definition: Commercial organization headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, that engages in the discovery and development of antibiotics against multidrug-resistant gram-negative bacteria. It develops compounds, which are active against difficult-to-treat gram-negative bacteria, such as multi-resistant Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, other species of Enterobacteriaceae, and Acinetobacter baumannii. (Adapted from Bloomberg Businessweek)
